design.name: Design different products
design.desc: I am interested in UX/UI design. Being able to make a product more user-friendly and appealing is a very satidifying thing to me!

movie.name: Watch movies and tv dramas
movie.desc: Movies and tv shows have always been a great creative inspiration to me. It is always difficult for me to pick one favourite movie/tv show, but just to name a few - Eternal Sunshine of the spotless mind, Before Sunrise, Trainspotting, Pulp Fiction, Better Call Saul, Bojack Horseman...

music.name: Listen to indie music
music.desc: I like different genres of music, like post-rock, indie pop, math-rock...Same as movie, it is no way I can pick one favourite only. My favourite bands includes slowdive, MEW, yuck, the drums, explosions in the sky, sunset rollercoster, deca join...
